synopsis:
1st year work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director：KIATCHOKECHAIKUL CHAYANIT
Music :Soyoka HAYASHI
Sound Design：Manami NODA
producer : Mitsuko OKAMOTO

Synopsis：
This is a story of a little girl who believes she can hatch an
egg one day if she keeps it warm.
